properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 4 at 4:02AM EST until January 5 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds
of 31 to 39 mph or gusts in excess of 45 mph are expected. Winds
this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high
profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST SUNDAY
